summary: A test module that validates the behavior of a sliding window splitter used to divide whole slide images into smaller patches. It checks correct patch generation, handling of overlaps, application of custom filters, and proper error handling across various WSI reader configurations.
business_intent: To guarantee the robustness and correctness of the whole slide image processing pipeline in digital pathology applications by ensuring the sliding window splitter functions as expected under different scenarios and raises appropriate errors when misconfigured.
